price: 41. Mise waxay leeyihiin shariigyo (ilaahyo u soo gargaaraya), marka ha keenaan shariigyadooda hadday run sheegayaan.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
